name: Light's Demo

Hi everyone, my name is faiz, but i have a nickname that's nickname is waffle pixel or you can call me waffle.

This game is still in development, if you want to support me you can donate or you can download the game for free and give me some advice or anything if there a bug in this game or some glitch, you can contacting me by this email >> lolipopfaiz0@gmail.com

this game is an rpg style genre its a simple game with a rich story, i will tell you all there are some easter egg that hidden in this game, if you can find it you will see the truth :v
